channel.title: oVirt on Eric's Learning Journey
channel.description: Recent content in oVirt on Eric's Learning Journey

item.title: How to install the ovirt-guest-agent in Ubuntu
item.description: Step 1 Please follow this link in order to install the ovirt-guest-agent in Ubuntu Step 2 Type the below commands to make sure the ovirt-guest-agent will autostart when VMs startup systemctl enable ovirt-guest-agent systemctl start ovirt-guest-agent Conclusion You learn how to install the ovirt guest agent and obtain additional information about the VM.
